titleStmt.title: The form of the proceeding to the coronation of their Majesties, King James the Second, and Queen Mary, the 23 of this instant April 1685. To be punctually observed by all persons therein concerned.

publicationStmt.publisher: by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: dark, with slight loss of text.
Signed at end: "I do appoint this proceeding to be printed the 14th. of April, 1685. Norfolk and Marshal, &c."
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
